languages.text: {n}Отче Иеронимус склонен в молитве. Чело его хмуро, а в глазах читается неприкрытая скорбь.{/n} "Приветствую тебя, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я возношу молитвы Императору за души, что были лишены возможности послужить Ему чуть дольше. Лишь то, что смерти их были мученическими, а значит, благостными для души, утешает меня. Что привело тебя?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Отче Иеронимус склонен в молитве. Чело его хмуро, а в глазах читается неприкрытая скорбь.{/n} "Приветствую тебя, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я возношу молитвы Императору за души, что были лишены возможности послужить ему чуть дольше. Лишь то, что смерти их были мученическими, а значит, благостными для души, утешает меня. Что привело тебя ко мне?"

languages.text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Отче Иеронимус склонен в молитве. Чело его хмуро, а в глазах читается неприкрытая скорбь.{/n} "Приветствую тебя, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я возношу молитвы Императору за души, что были лишены возможности послужить Ему чуть дольше. Лишь то, что смерти их были мученическими, а значит, благостными для души, утешает меня. Что привело тебя?"

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムス司祭がかがんで祈りをささげている。額には、しわが寄り、眼は隠そうともしない悲しみで満ちている。{/n}「おお、若きフォン・ヴァランシウスよ。皇帝にお仕えする機会を奪われた魂のために、少しばかり長く祈りを捧げていたところです。彼らの最後が苦悶に満ち、そして昇華されたものだったらしいことだけがせめてもの慰めです。私にどのような用がおありですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムス司祭がかがんで祈りをささげている。額には、しわが寄り、眼は隠そうともしない悲しみで満ちている。{/n}「おお、若きフォン・ヴァランシウスよ。皇帝にお仕えする機会を奪われた魂のために、少しばかり長く祈りを捧げていたところです。彼らの最後が苦悶に満ち、そして昇華されたものだったらしいことだけがせめてもの慰めです。私にどのような用がおありですか？」

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, le révérend Hiéronymus est concentré sur sa prière. Ses yeux sont remplis d'un chagrin qu'il ne cherche pas à dissimuler.{/n} « Salutations, jeune von Valancius. J'adresse à l'Empereur mes prières pour ces âmes privées de la chance de Le servir plus longtemps. Je me console en me disant que leurs derniers instants auront été placés sous le signe de l'angoisse, et donc de la sublimation. Que me vaut l'honneur de votre visite ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, le révérend Hiéronymus est concentré sur sa prière. Ses yeux sont remplis d'un chagrin qu'il ne cherche pas à dissimuler.{/n} « Bonjour, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. J'adresse à l'Empereur mes prières pour ces âmes privées de la chance de Le servir plus longtemps. Je me console en me disant que leurs derniers instants auront été placés sous le signe de l'angoisse, et donc de la sublimation. Que me vaut l'honneur de votre visite ? »

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯牧师正低头祈祷。他眉头紧锁，眼中满是无法掩饰的悲伤。{/n}“你好，年轻的冯·瓦兰修斯。我正在向帝皇祈祷，因为那些灵魂失去了继续侍奉祂的机会。不过，令我感到欣慰的是，我知道他们的死亡充满了痛苦，因此他们的灵魂也得到了升华。是什么风把你吹到这里来了？”
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯牧师正低头祈祷。他眉头紧皱，眼中满是无法掩饰的悲伤。{/n}“你好，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。我正在向帝皇祈祷，因为那些灵魂失去了继续侍奉祂的机会。不过，令我感到欣慰的是，我知道他们的死亡充满了痛苦，因此他们的灵魂也得到了升华。是什么风把你吹到这里来了？”

languages.text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus ist im Gebet vornübergebeugt. Seine Stirn liegt in Falten, und seine Augen sind voller Trauer, die er auch nicht zu verbergen sucht.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|junger|junge} von Valancius. Ich bete zum Imperator für die Seelen, die der Chance beraubt wurden, ihm noch ein wenig länger zu dienen. Mich tröstet lediglich die Sicherheit, dass ihre letzten Moment von Angst und damit von Läuterung erfüllt waren. Was führt Euch zu mir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus ist im Gebet vornübergebeugt. Seine Stirn liegt in Falten, und seine Augen sind voller Trauer, die er auch nicht zu verbergen sucht.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}! Ich bete zum Imperator für die Seelen, die der Chance beraubt wurden, ihm noch ein wenig länger zu dienen. Mich tröstet lediglich die Sicherheit, dass ihre letzten Moment von Angst und damit von Läuterung erfüllt waren. Was führt Euch zu mir?"

languages.text: {n}El reverendo Hieronymus reza encorvado, con el ceño fruncido y una mirada apesadumbrada que no intenta ocultar.{/n} «Saludos, joven von Valancius. Rezo al Emperador por las almas a las que se les ha arrebatado la oportunidad de servirlo durante más tiempo. Lo único que me consuela es saber que sus últimos momentos fueron de angustia y, por lo tanto, de ensalzamiento. ¿Qué le trae aquí?».
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El reverendo Hieronymus reza encorvado, con el ceño fruncido y una mirada apesadumbrada que no intenta ocultar.{/n} «Saludos, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Rezo al Emperador por las almas a las que se les ha arrebatado la oportunidad de servirlo durante más tiempo. Lo único que me consuela es saber que sus últimos momentos fueron de angustia y, por lo tanto, de ensalzamiento. ¿Qué le trae aquí?».

languages.text: {n}Muhterem Hieronymus eğilerek dua ediyor. Kaşları çatık, gözleri de gizleme gereği duymadığı bir üzüntüyle kaplı.{/n} "Merhabalar genç von Valancius. O'na daha uzun süre hizmet etme şansları ellerinden alınan ruhlar için İmparator'a dua ediyorum. Tek tesellim, son anlarının ızdıraplı olup bu sayede ölümleri ulvi bir kimlik kazanmış olmaları. Seni bana getiren şey nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Reverend Hieronymus is bowed in prayer. His brow is furrowed, and his eyes are filled with grief that he does not attempt to hide.{/n} "Greetings, young von Valancius. I am offering my prayers to the Emperor for the souls that were robbed of a chance to serve Him for a little while longer. All that consoles me is knowing that their final moments were those of anguish, and thus, of sublimation. What brings you to me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muhterem Hieronymus eğilerek dua ediyor. Kaşları çatık ve gözleri gizleme gereği duymadığı bir üzüntüyle kaplı.{/n} "Merhabalar genç von Valancius. O'na bir süre daha hizmet etme şansları ellerinden alınan ruhlar için İmparator'a dua ediyorum. Tek tesellim son anlarının acı dolu olmuş olması, bu sayede ölümleri ulvi bir kimlik kazanmış. Seni bana getiren şey nedir?"
